title: Variable prompting and validation
description:
Build the system that prompts users for template variables.

## Features
- Read variables from manifest.yaml
- Present prompts with examples
- Validate required fields
- Support options (dropdown choices)
- Handle defaults
- Store collected values for template processing

## Integration
- Works with AskUserQuestion tool
- Or interactive CLI prompts
- Supports non-interactive mode with flags

title: new-project skill integration
description:
Integrate template instantiation with /conductor:new-project skill.

## Features
- Parse --starter flag
- Load starter from TabzTemplates
- Run variable collection
- Execute template processing
- Initialize target project
- Run post-setup commands (npm install, etc.)

## UX
- Clear progress indicators
- Error handling with helpful messages
- Summary of what was created

title: python-api starter template
description:
FastAPI backend service starter.

## Tech Stack
- FastAPI
- SQLAlchemy + Alembic
- Pydantic v2
- PostgreSQL
- pytest + httpx

## Template Contents
- CRUD endpoints
- Auth scaffolding (JWT)
- Database models
- Migrations setup
- Docker compose
- OpenAPI docs

## Variables
- project_name
- description
- database (postgres/sqlite)
- auth_type (jwt/oauth/none)

title: Template file processor
description:
Process .tmpl files and replace {{variables}}.

## Features
- Read all .tmpl files from templates/
- Replace {{variable}} placeholders with values
- Handle nested variables
- Generate output files (strip .tmpl extension)
- Support conditional sections (optional)

## Edge Cases
- Escape sequences for literal braces
- Missing variables (error or warn)
- Multi-line variable values

title: MCP and plugin config generation
description:
Generate .mcp.json and plugin configurations.

## Features
- Read mcp_servers from manifest.yaml
- Generate .mcp.json with server configs
- Read plugins from manifest.yaml
- Generate plugin installation instructions
- Validate server/plugin availability

## Output
- .mcp.json file
- Setup instructions in CLAUDE.md

title: Beads issue ID generation
description:
Generate proper beads issue IDs for instantiated projects.

## Requirements
- Replace {{prefix}} with project-specific prefix
- Ensure unique IDs across issues
- Maintain dependency references
- Initialize beads database in target project

## Flow
1. Generate project prefix from project_name
2. Process issues.jsonl.tmpl
3. Replace all {{prefix}}-XXX references
4. Import into target .beads/

title: monorepo starter template
description:
Turborepo multi-package monorepo starter.

## Tech Stack
- Turborepo
- pnpm workspaces
- TypeScript
- Shared configs (eslint, tsconfig)
- Changesets

## Template Contents
- apps/ folder (web, docs)
- packages/ folder (ui, utils, config)
- Shared TypeScript config
- Pipeline configuration
- CI with caching

## Variables
- project_name
- apps (list)
- packages (list)

title: chrome-extension starter template
description:
Browser extension starter with modern tooling.

## Tech Stack
- Manifest V3
- TypeScript
- Vite/CRXJS
- React (optional)
- Tailwind CSS

## Template Contents
- Background service worker
- Content script
- Popup UI
- Options page
- Storage utilities
- Message passing

## Variables
- extension_name
- description
- permissions (list)
- has_popup (bool)
- has_options (bool)

title: cli-tool starter template
description:
Command-line tool starter with Node.js or Python.

## Tech Stack Options
- Node.js: commander/yargs + TypeScript + vitest
- Python: typer/click + pytest

## Template Contents
- CLI argument parsing
- Config file support
- Help/version commands
- Unit tests
- CI workflow

## Variables
- tool_name
- language (node/python)
- description
- author

title: New Starter Templates
description:
Create additional starter templates for different project types.

Target starters:
- cli-tool: Command-line tools with testing
- python-api: FastAPI backend services
- chrome-extension: Browser extensions
- monorepo: Turborepo multi-package

title: Template Instantiation System
description:
Build the logic that takes a starter template and user variables, then generates a ready-to-use project.

Core features:
- Variable prompting and validation
- Template file processing ({{variable}} replacement)
- Beads issue generation with proper IDs
- MCP config generation
- Plugin installation hints
